scripts.start:dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:homepage" "npm run start:team-dashboard"
scripts.build: npm run build:homepage && npm run build:team-dashboard
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:homepage && npm run install:server && npm run install:team-dashboard
scripts.lint: npm run lint:homepage && npm run lint:server && npm run lint:team-dashboard
scripts.prettify: npm run prettify:homepage && npm run prettify:server && npm run prettify:team-dashboard
scripts.deploy: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node server/src/index.js
